title: Define Project Scope
description: Create a comprehensive document outlining the objectives, deliverables, stakeholders, timelines, and budget for the FarmOracle project.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and document requirements for the FarmOracle system, including AI algorithms, satellite imagery processing, user interface design, database schema, and security considerations.

title: Design AI Algorithms for Crop Yield Forecasting
description: Develop machine learning algorithms to analyze satellite imagery and forecast crop yield based on historical data, weather patterns, soil conditions, and other relevant factors.

title: Design User Interface for FarmOracle System
description: Create a user-friendly interface that allows farmers to easily upload, analyze, and visualize satellite imagery of their farms, as well as access suggested improvements.

title: Develop Satellite Imagery Processing Module
description: Implement a module to preprocess, enhance, and analyze satellite imagery for accurate crop yield forecasting.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithms for Crop Yield Forecasting

title: Implement Database Schema and Connect to APIs
description: Design the database schema for FarmOracle and connect it to relevant APIs, such as satellite imagery providers and meteorological services.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithms for Crop Yield Forecasting

title: Implement Security Measures for FarmOracle System
description: Ensure the security of the FarmOracle system by implementing authentication, authorization, and data encryption measures.

title: Perform System Integration and Testing
description: Combine the different components of FarmOracle and test the overall system for functionality, performance, usability, and security.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithms for Crop Yield Forecasting
Design User Interface for FarmOracle System
Implement Database Schema and Connect to APIs
Implement Security Measures for FarmOracle System

title: Deploy FarmOracle System
description: Launch the FarmOracle system on a suitable infrastructure, ensuring it is scalable, secure, and reliable.
